basic.title: Tell us about your business
basic.description: Start with the basic information about your business that customers will see first.
basic.nameEnHelp: Enter your business name as it appears on your storefront or official documents.
basic.nameZhHelp: Optional: Enter your business name in Chinese characters.
basic.descriptionEnPlaceholder: Authentic Sichuan cuisine with traditional flavors and modern presentation...
basic.descriptionEnHelp: Describe what makes your business special. What products or services do you offer?
basic.descriptionZhPlaceholder: 正宗川菜，传统口味与现代呈现相结合...
basic.descriptionZhHelp: Optional: Describe your business in Chinese.
basic.categoriesHelp: Select the categories that best describe your business. You can choose multiple.
basic.requiredFields: Business name and at least one category are required to continue.

location.title: Where is your business located?
location.description: Help customers find you by providing your complete address.
location.addressHelp: Enter your complete street address where customers can find you.
location.tip1: Use the exact address customers would use to find you
location.tip2: Include suite, floor, or unit numbers if applicable
location.tip3: Make sure your address matches your Google Maps listing

contact.title: How can customers reach you?
contact.description: Provide at least one way for customers to contact your business.
contact.phoneHelp: Primary phone number for customer inquiries and reservations.
contact.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number.
contact.emailHelp: Business email address for customer inquiries.
contact.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
contact.websiteHelp: Your business website, online ordering, or social media page.
contact.contactRequiredText: Please provide at least one way for customers to contact you (phone, email, or website).
contact.privacy1: Your contact information will be displayed publicly on your business listing
contact.privacy2: You can update or remove your information at any time
contact.privacy3: We will never sell or share your information with third parties

hours.title: When are you open?
hours.description: Let customers know when they can visit your business. This step is optional.
hours.tip1: Accurate hours help customers plan their visits
hours.tip2: You can set different hours for each day of the week
hours.tip3: Mark days as 'Closed' if you don't operate that day
hours.tip4: Use '24 Hours' for businesses that never close
hours.skipNotice: You can skip this step and add hours later if needed.

photos.title: Show off your business
photos.description: Photos help customers see what to expect when they visit your business.
photos.comingSoonDescription: We're working on photo upload functionality. For now, you can submit your business and add photos later.
photos.guideline2: Show your storefront, interior, products, or services
photos.guideline3: Avoid photos with people's faces without permission
photos.guideline5: Photos will be reviewed before appearing on your listing
photos.skipNotice: Photos are optional - you can add them later

preview.title: Review your business listing
preview.description: This is how your business will appear in the directory. Double-check everything before submitting.
preview.pendingStatusDescription: Your business will be reviewed before appearing in the directory
preview.instruction1: Your business will be reviewed within 24-48 hours
preview.instruction2: You'll receive an email confirmation after submission
preview.instruction3: Once approved, your business will appear in search results
preview.instruction4: You can claim and edit your business listing later
preview.doubleCheck: Please double-check all information is correct.
preview.submitConfirmation: By submitting, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
